verses.text: And when \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* were \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*, and all the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* were \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*.

And \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add that were\add* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w bands|strong="H1416"\w*: the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* a \w Beerothite|strong="H0886"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: (for \w Beeroth|strong="H0881"\w* also was \w reckoned|strong="H2803"\w* to \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*:\f + \fr 4.2 \ft other: Heb. second\f*
And the \w Beerothites|strong="H0886"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* to \w Gittaim|strong="H1664"\w*, and were \w sojourners|strong="H1481"\w* there until this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.)

And \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, had a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add that was\add* \w lame|strong="H5223"\w* of \add his\add* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*. He was \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when the \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* out of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and his \w nurse|strong="H0539"\w* took him \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*: and it came to pass, as she made \w haste|strong="H2648"\w* to \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, that he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*, and became \w lame|strong="H6452"\w*. And his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*.\f + \fr 4.4 \ft Mephibosheth: or, Merib-baal\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* the \w Beerothite|strong="H0886"\w*, \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* and \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* about the \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w*, who \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* on a \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* at \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*.

And they came \w thither|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add as though\add* they would have \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*; and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him under the \w fifth|strong="H2570"\w* \add rib:\add* and \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* and \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*.

For when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, he \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* on his \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* in his \w bedchamber|strong="H2315"\w*, and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, and \w beheaded|strong="H5493"\w* him, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and gat them \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w through|strong="H1870"\w* the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* all \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Behold the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* thine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, which \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hath|strong="H5414"\w* \w avenged|strong="H5360"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w* and \w Baanah|strong="H1196"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* the \w Beerothite|strong="H0886"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, who hath \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* out of all \w adversity|strong="H6869"\w*,

When one \w told|strong="H5046"\w* me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, thinking to have \w brought|strong="H5869"\w* good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, I took \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* of him, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* him in \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, who \add thought\add* that I would have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him a reward for his \w tidings|strong="H1309"\w*:\f + \fr 4.10 \ft thinking…: Heb. he was in his own eyes as a bringer, etc\f*\f + \fr 4.10 \ft who…: or, which was the reward I gave him for his tidings\f*

How much more, when \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* have \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* a \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w person|strong="H0376"\w* in his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w* upon his \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*? shall I not therefore now \w require|strong="H1245"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and take you \w away|strong="H1197"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, and they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them, and cut \w off|strong="H7112"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* and their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and hanged \add them\add* \w up|strong="H8518"\w* over the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*. But they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \add it\add* in the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.
